section.name: Beigesoft™ Enterprise Information System, Bob's pizza example.
section.p: * In English language a word can means many things, even unrelated. Here word "Accounting entries" means "Journal entries". There is neither a "Book" nor "Journals". There is a database table that contains all accounting entries. "Accounting of [something]" means "how to record this in an accounting (bookkeeping) system". "To account a document" means making (creating) accounting entries for this document. "A document" can be an invoice, for example.
